events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible.
The issue has been categorized under Refund due to the customer's request for money back after receiving the incorrect product.
Support agent Sarah has been assigned to handle the refund request for this case.
Hello! I’m Sarah from customer support. I understand you received the wrong item and want a refund. I’m here to assist you.
Could you please provide a photo of the item you received and your order number to help us process your refund quickly?
Here is the photo of the product I received along with my order number 12345ABC. Please let me know the next steps.
Thank you for the information. We will process your refund immediately and send a confirmation email within 2 business days.
Thanks for the quick response and helpful support. I appreciate your assistance in resolving this promptly.
Your refund has been processed successfully. Please check your email for confirmation and the refund transaction details.
Just following up to ensure your refund was received and that everything is resolved to your satisfaction.
Since no further issues have been reported, we are closing this case. Thank you for contacting customer support.
